ocrd-cor-asv-fst-process.description: Improve text annotation by FST error and lexicon model with character-level LSTM language model

keraslm_file.description: path of h5py weight/config file for language model trained with keraslm

errorfst_file.description: path of FST file for error model

lexiconfst_file.description: path of FST file for lexicon model

textequiv_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to read TextEquiv input on (output will always be word level)

beam_width.description: maximum number of best partial paths to consider during beam search in language modelling

lm_weight.description: share of the LM scores over the FST output confidences
